intro: Smilax luei, commonly known as the Chinese smilax, is a species of flowering plant in the family Araceae. It is native to China and is characterized by its woody stems and spiny leaves. The plant produces small, yellowish-green flowers that are clustered in umbels, followed by bright red berries. Smilax luei is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and shrublands. It has been used in traditional Chinese medicine for its purported medicinal properties.
